name: Light Eaters
description:
Light Eaters

Lightrays on the surface of earth are continuosly renewed by sun. And it is known that lightrays that go underneath the ground are doomed to die out eventually if the light of Sun can't reach them.

In this moody, dark-fantasy inspired side-scroller you must guide a lost lightray back to surface. Quick, before light dies out!

--------------------

developed by Papu Games
